dcterms:creator: R.E. Whaley
dcterms:description: The VIX dataset contains historical data on the Volatility Index (VIX), which measures the market's expectation of future volatility based on S&P 500 index options. The dataset spans from August 22, 2013, to July 31, 2023, and includes daily observations.
dcterms:title: VIX dataset
